meanings.definition: A person who grows plants or crops.
meanings.sent1: The growers in the community work hard to cultivate fresh vegetables.
meanings.sent2: Farmers are important growers who provide food for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The growers at the local farm had a competition to see who could grow the biggest pumpkin.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for gardening made her a dedicated grower of beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The young girl aspired to be a successful grower of fruits and vegetables one day.

meanings.definition: A company or organization that produces goods for sale.
meanings.sent1: Local growers supply the market with fresh produce every week.
meanings.sent2: Large growers often have warehouses to store their products before distribution.
meanings.sent3: The growers of handmade soaps saw a significant increase in sales after the holiday season.
meanings.sent4: The tech company established itself as a major player among growers of electronic devices.
meanings.sent5: The small business started as a humble grower of organic skincare products.

meanings.definition: A type of underwear designed to enhance the appearance of the wearer's genitals.
meanings.sent1: The store displayed various styles of growers in the lingerie section.
meanings.sent2: Some people prefer wearing growers for special occasions to feel more confident.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show featured models showcasing the latest trends in growers.
meanings.sent4: He felt self-conscious until he found the perfect pair of growers that suited him.
meanings.sent5: The designer created a line of luxurious growers that became popular among fashion enthusiasts.
